amendment.description: To prohibit Members from using 501(c)(3) organizations for personal or political gain.

action.text: Amendment SA 2954 ruled out of order by the chair.
Amendment SA 2954 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S2493; text: CR S2493) To prohibit Members from using 501(c)(3) organizations for personal or political gain.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2954 proposed by Senator Dodd for Senator Baucus.
